title: Extracting social determinants of health from dental clinical notes
details: F Pethani, A Chapman, M Conway, X Dai, D Bishay… - Applied Clinical Informatics, 2025
abstract: Objective In dentistry, social determinants of health (SDoH) are potentially recorded in the clinical notes of Electronic Dental Records (EDRs). The objective of this study was to examine the availability of SDoH data in dental clinical notes and evaluate …
